api-feature.title: Implement [Feature] API Endpoint
api-feature.iWant: to access [feature] functionality via REST API
api-feature.soThat: I can integrate this feature into my application

acceptanceCriteria.description: API endpoint accepts valid requests and returns expected response
API validates input parameters and returns appropriate errors
API endpoint is documented with OpenAPI specification
API endpoint has rate limiting implemented
API endpoint requires authentication

ui-component.title: Create [Component] UI Component
ui-component.iWant: to interact with [component] in the application

acceptanceCriteria.description: Component renders correctly with provided props
Component is accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant)
Component is responsive across all breakpoints
Component has unit tests with >90% coverage
Component is documented in Storybook

database-migration.title: Add [Entity] Database Schema
database-migration.iWant: to store [entity] data in the database
database-migration.soThat: the application can persist and query this information

acceptanceCriteria.description: Database migration runs without errors
Rollback migration is provided and tested
Indexes are created for frequently queried fields
Foreign key constraints are properly defined
Schema changes are backward compatible

performance-optimization.title: Optimize [Feature] Performance
performance-optimization.soThat: I have a smooth user experience

acceptanceCriteria.description: Page load time is under 3 seconds
API response time is under 200ms for 95th percentile
Memory usage does not increase over time (no leaks)
Performance metrics are tracked and monitored
Caching strategy is implemented where appropriate

security-enhancement.title: Implement [Security Feature]
security-enhancement.soThat: user data and system integrity are maintained

acceptanceCriteria.description: Security feature passes penetration testing
No new vulnerabilities introduced (security scan passes)
Security headers are properly configured
Audit logging is implemented for security events
Security documentation is updated
Bug no longer reproduces with provided steps
Regression test is added to prevent recurrence
No new bugs introduced (existing tests pass)
Root cause is documented
Fix is verified in production environment

feature-flag.title: Add Feature Flag for [Feature]
feature-flag.soThat: we can safely deploy and test in production

acceptanceCriteria.description: Feature flag can be toggled without deployment
Feature works correctly when flag is enabled
Feature is completely hidden when flag is disabled
Feature flag can target specific users/groups
Metrics are collected for flag usage
Integration successfully connects and authenticates
Error handling covers all failure scenarios
Integration is configurable via environment variables
Circuit breaker pattern is implemented
Integration is monitored with alerts

data-migration.title: Migrate [Data] from [Source] to [Destination]
data-migration.iWant: to move data safely between systems

acceptanceCriteria.description: All data is migrated without loss
Data integrity is verified post-migration
Migration can be rolled back if needed
Downtime is minimized (< 30 minutes)
Migration process is documented

monitoring.title: Add Monitoring for [Component/Service]
monitoring.soThat: we can proactively identify and resolve issues

acceptanceCriteria.description: Key metrics are identified and collected
Dashboards are created for visualization
Alerts are configured for critical thresholds
Logs are structured and searchable
SLIs and SLOs are defined and tracked
